## readFileList() function

reads lines from a file and removes the ones that are whitespace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function readFileList(path: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to read the file from |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string[]`
